title: Can not sign in to Gmail from Thunderbird
content:
I've followed Thunderbird setup according to "Automatic Conversion of Google mail accounts to OAuth 2.0 Authentication" (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/automatic-conversion-google-mail-accounts-oauth20) The failure is described in my initial post below:

Mozilla Support - Signin, and use of Thunderbird https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1484529#answer-1729438

LarryGad post (Reply to Ashley LambertonQuestion owner): I get the same screenshot Ashley posted above. But...clicking Allow doesn't download my Gmail messages. And clicking the link, Account Permissions, just produces a blank window. An idiosyncrasy is I'm the domain administrator for a "Free Legacy Edition of G Suite for personal use".

This paragraph may not be relevant to the above issue. I did stumble across the Account settings link (https://myaccount.google.com/general-light?pli=1) which contains the line: 'Connected accounts View and manage your accounts from other services' Clicking the 'View ...' link goes to https://profiles.google.com/connectedaccounts and displays the message: "404. That’s an error. The requested URL was not found on this server. That’s all we know." Highlighting the 'View ...' link shows https://profiles.google.com/connectedaccounts?authuser=0

Thanks in advance.
creator: larrygad

content:

I then proceeded to download a 128 version of thunderbird on my laptop but couldn't successfully login (all server settings were correct), however I managed to get to my account where I could see QR code but still couldn't get the code to work. Just wondering how I can get thunderbird to work on my Samsung please?

Thanks Tyson
creator: mototastic

title: Problemas en el correo electrónico
content:
Hola buenas tardes, desde el día 28 de abril, tras el apagón, no tenemos correo electrónico. No recibimos, ni podemos enviar correos. Nos sale el mensaje que adjuntamos, y que también describimos, y que es el siguiente: "Fallo el envío del mensaje. El mensaje no se ha podido enviar porque ha fallado la conexión al servidor de salida (SMTP). El servidor puede no estar disponible o está rechazando conexiones SMTP. Verifique que los ajustes de su servidor de salida (SMTP) son correctos y vuelva a intentarlo." Necesitamos a la mayor urgencia una respuesta. Gracias

Hello, good afternoon. Since April 28th, after the blackout, we have no email. We neither receive not send emails. We receive the attached message, which we also describe, which is as follows: "Message sending failed. The message could not be sent because the connection to the outgoing server (SMTP) failed. The server may be unavailable or is rejecting SMTP connections. Verify that your outgoing server (SMTP) settings are correct and try again." We urgently need a response. Thank you.
creator: cendaldavid

title: AUTENTICAZIONE NON RIUSCITA AL SERVER Imap.gmail.com

title: Spell checker problem
content:
Mac OS Sequoia Version 15.4.1 (24E263), Apple Mac mini 2022, chip M1 Firefox 138.0.1 and Thunderbird 128.10.0

I have both English and French spell checker activated. I often run into problems with misspelled words that when you choose the correct word from a list, example: lainding instead of landing, you can click a number of times and it does not correct the spelling. Some really easy typos like laon instead of loan it highlihgts the error but offers no alternative spelling. In fact it just happened for "highlights" in this message if you stop immediately and try to correct it it will not correct.
creator: mikep82400

Very grateful for any help' Thank you, kindest regards Brian Benger PS where will I get your reply if my email not working??

title: Posta cancellata
content: Salve a tutti: Ho già inviata una richiesta ma non sono riuscito ad leggere la risposta; da diversi giorni Thunderbird cancella immediatamente la posta in arrivo, non viene spostata in nessuna cartella, sono tutte vuote anche il cestino. Uso un PC con Windows 10 a 64 Bit, ho installato l'ultima versione di Thunderbird 128.10.0esr; i programmi del Pc sono aggiornati, ho come antivirus NOD 32. Ringraziando chi mi darà una risposta Cordialmente saluto tutti Roberto G.

title: Thunderbird 128.10.0esr Windows 10 Suddenly Stopped Getting New Mwssages
content: I am running Windows 10 with Thunderbird 128.10.0esr. I was getting login password errors at random. I would close and reopen with no issues. New Messages would load as normal and I could get new messages with no problem. Now I get no new messages nor can I get new messages by clicking on the "Get Messages". I have been using Thunderbird since it came out with no issues. I did not reconfigure anything. I can find no helpful information anywhere. Please Help. I can still get email on other devices except for this one. This is the third time I have posted this with no response from anyone.
creator: gdvalle

title: Getting "unable to login at server"
content: I started getting error messages to say that my account was rejected at the server, This happened on all my email accounts. I obviously checked that the configuration of the accounts was correct although they had been working previously. I removed my VPN and Firewall, removed the app and deleted residual data and then re-installed. I still have the same/similar problem, when i try to add an account i get a message saying "Unable to login to Server, probably the wrong configuration, username or password" All of which have been checked multiple times.
creator: corinium
